mapper.insert: insert into ParkingSpaceBill( orderJnlNo, userId, carno, spaceno, billStatus, parkHours, unitPrice, budgetPrice, createTime, delayParkHours, spaceOwnerUserId, lastPayTime, payedMoney ) values( #{orderJnlNo}, #{userId}, #{carno}, #{spaceno}, #{billStatus}, #{parkHours}, #{unitPrice}, #{budgetPrice}, #{createTime}, #{delayParkHours}, #{spaceOwnerUserId}, #{lastPayTime}, #{payedMoney} )
mapper.update:
update ParkingSpaceBill
parkHours = parkHours + #{delayParkHours}, budgetPrice = parkHours * unitPrice, delayParkHours = #{delayParkHours},
billStatus = #{billStatus},
where orderJnlNo = #{orderJnlNo}
mapper.select:
select t.* from vParkingSpaceBill t where 1=1
and t.billStatus = 1
and t.createTime < date_add(now(), interval -${@com.parkspace.util.Constants@RESERVE_TIME} MINUTE )

select t.* from vParkingSpaceBill t where 1=1
and t.billStatus in (2,3)
and ifnull(t.lastPayTime,t.createTime) < date_add(now(), interval -${@com.parkspace.util.Constants@PAY_INTERVAL_HOUR} hour )
